name: Rebounding Down
script:
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then 
if ak.ai() then return end
ak.defs.reRebounding = true
ak.defs.rebounding = false
ak.scoreup(matches[2])
end
matches: ([\w'\-]+)'s aura of weapons rebounding disappears.
You flay away ([\w'\-]+)'s aura of rebounding defence.
You call upon Whiirh to empower your staff and strike ([\w'\-]+), the power of air dispersing [\w'\-]+ aura of rebounding.
You call upon Whiirh and unleash a forceful blow towards ([\w'\-]+) with your trusty staff.
You call upon Whiirh and unleash a forceful blow towards ([\w'\-]+)'s .* with your trusty staff.
^You raze ([\w'\-]+)\'s aura of rebounding with .*\.$
^You raze ([\w'\-]+)\'s speed defence with .+\.$
^You whip .+ through the air in front of ([\w'\-]+)\, to no effect\.$
^You try to flay a non-existent aura of rebounding from ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^[\w'\-]+ razes ([\w'\-]+)\'s aura of rebounding with .*\.$
^You flay away ([\w'\-]+)\'s speed defence\.$
^You whip .* through the air in front of ([\w'\-]+)\, to no effect\.$
^[\w'\-]+ delivers a terrible stroke with .*\, scything straight through the aura of rebounding surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Lunging forward\, you bring .* in a savage diagonal blow\, carving through ([\w'\-]+)\'s aura of rebounding\.$
^You lunge toward ([\w'\-]+) with .*\, but finding no resistance\, you stumble hopelessly off balance\.$
^Continuing your assault\, you whip .* in a vicious rising slash at ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You lurch forward at ([\w'\-]+)\, swinging .* in a wildly innacurate blow\.$
^[\w'\-]+\'s cantata shatters the defences surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^[\w'\-]+ calls upon Whiirh and strikes ([\w'\-]+) with [\w'\-]+ staff\, the power of air dispersing [\w'\-]+ aura of rebounding\.$
^The falcon dives at ([\w'\-]+)\, ripping apart [\w'\-]+ aura of rebounding with its talons\.$
^[\w'\-]+ lunges toward ([\w'\-]+)\, but stumbles off balance as if expecting some barrier\.$
^Planting your feet, you whirl .+ over your head before bringing it down with terrible force upon ([\w'\-]+), shattering (?:his|her) aura of rebounding\.$
^[\w'\-]+ whips .+ through the air in front of ([\w'\-]+)\, to no effect\.$
^You lurch forward at ([\w'\-]+)\, swinging .* in a wildly innacurate blow\.$
^You deliver a single\, powerful blow against the aura of rebounding surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\, fracturing it\.$
^The daegger cuts through (\w+)\'s skullcap\-formed aura\.$
^Your mace ignites in holy flame\, burning away (\w)\'s protective aura\.$
